title: Information is Beautiful Awards: Entries Closing Today
content:
Last chance to enter our yearly awards and for a chance to win big from our $20,000+ prize pot.

Hosted by The Data Visualisation Society, a professional home and community for those working in this discipline.

If you create in this field, you may wish to submit your work.

Entries of any type are welcome: infographics, data journalism, maps, interactives, information art, video, animation, app, site, sculpture, or artwork. Pieces can be created in any software, platform, or medium, using any type of materials.

Categories:

» Arts, Entertainment & Culture
» Business Analytics
» Current Affairs & Politics
» Humanitarian
» Leisure, Games & Sport
» People, Language & Identity
» Places, Spaces & Environment
» Science, Technology & Health
» Unusual

Entries are currently open and will close on 3rd Feb 2025.
Any work created between Sep 1st 2023 and Dec 31st 2024 is eligible.

» See more criteria for entry

You can see previous years’ winners and entries on the Information is Beautiful Awards Showcase.
author: David McCandless
